markdownRemark.html: Create a positive narrative through challenging situations. The challenges are real and the outcome may be undetermined, and the narrative can still remain positive. Emphasize positivity, find solutions to problems, make it a positive arc.

frontmatter.description: The challenges are real and the outcome may be undetermined, and the narrative can still remain positive. Emphasize positivity, find solutions to problems, make it a positive narrative.
frontmatter.title: Positive narrative
